attributes.action: scrap the “golden goodbye” payments for MPs who are forced to stand down in disgrace.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lets stop this nonsense now !!  Disgraced MP's should not be allowed to take more of our Taxpayers money ?  By hanging on until the next election they will automatically qualify for a “winding up” allowance worth £42K each to shut down their offices.  In addition MPs will also receive a “resettlement grant” worth up to £65K, dependent on age and length of service, to help them with the costs of “adjusting to non-parliamentary life”.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
